name: CPNowPlayingTemplateObserver
desc: The methods for responding to the user interacting with the Now Playing template.

items.name: func nowPlayingTemplateAlbumArtistButtonTapped(CPNowPlayingTemplate)
items.desc: Tells the observer that the user tapped the Album-Artist button.

items.name: func nowPlayingTemplateUpNextButtonTapped(CPNowPlayingTemplate)
items.desc: Tells the observer that the user tapped the Up Next button.
